text: Læa cng bricakh cak sing thi rea di hı paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea kxn thi khwam tay ca keid khun kæ phu dı nı hmu phwk cea læw khea k ca klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh matr wa phraxngkh than thrng phxnphan hı kæ kha phraxngkh xik chaw wela pheiyng leknxy pheux thi kha phraxngkh ca di bricakh læa kha phraxngkh k ca xyu nı hmu khn di thanghlay (phuthrng khunthrrm)
